idea:
Netkari is a start-up designer clothing line targeted at men, women, and kids. The company plans to promote eco-friendly fashion by using natural and organic materials. Netkari intends to market its line as an alternative to existing brands in market, and differentiate itself by its marketing strategies, exclusivity and brand awareness.
The company's promotional plan is diverse and includes a range of marketing communications. In the future, the company hopes to develop lines of accessories for men, women, and kids. These accessories will include cologne/perfume, jewelry, eye-wear, watches, bags, shoes etc.
name: VDN TEXTILE AND APPARELS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Mobile Application, Software Development, Graphic Designing, Video Editing, Digital Marketing, Web Designing
